thread.title_full: Come bloccare i siti Web che producono cripto-monete col nostro PC

posts.author: Giovanni Garro
posts.title: Come bloccare i siti Web che producono cripto-monete col nostro PC
posts.text:
Come bloccare i siti Web che producono cripto-monete col nostro PC Come bloccare i siti Web che producono cripto-monete col nostro PC 7 novembre 2017 Alcuni siti sfruttano di nascosto il nostro processore per il mining delle cripto-valute rallentando il computer, ma con un piccolo tool possiamo impedirlo. 
Diversi siti Web hanno iniziato a inserire nelle loro pagine uno script Java che sfrutta la potenza di calcolo del processore dei visitatori per produrre cripto-monete come il Bitcoin . Queste valute non sono stampate come il denaro normale ma vengono prodotte attraverso un’operazione che in gergo si chiama mining . 
In italiano il termine mining può essere tradotto con “ estrarre ”. In parole molto semplici, per produrre le cripto-monete si utilizza un algoritmo che richiede una grande potenza di calcolo. Sfruttando un apposito script Java, diversi siti riescono a sfruttare la potenza di calcolo dei loro visitatori per produrre cripto-monete senza dover acquistare l’hardware necessario. 
Spesso questo avviene di nascosto: i visitatori si accorgono solo che il proprio computer inizia ad andare lento e che il processore è sotto sforzo senza spiegarsi il perché. Per bloccare questi script ed evitare che il proprio computer rallenti quando visita questi siti, si può utilizzare il piccolo tool Anti-WebMiner . 
Anti-WebMiner riesce a bloccare gli script incriminati modificando il file host di Windows . Per usarlo non si deve far altro che avviarlo e cliccare sul pulsante Protect . TAGS

posts.title: Çalımbay’dan takımına yakın markaj
posts.text:
07.11.2017 12:28 Trabzonspor Teknik Direktörü Rıza Çalımbay, oyuncularını yakın markaja alıyor. 
Trabzonspor Teknik Direktörü Rıza Çalımbay, oyuncularını yakın markaja alıyor. Bordo-mavililerin yeni patronu Antalya'da yapılacak olan kampta sıkıntıları tespit edip çözüm üretecek. 
Süper Lig'de geride kalan 11 haftalık bölümde 13 puan toplayarak 12. sırada yer alan Trabzonspor, milli maçlar nedeniyle lige verilen arada Antalya Belek'te kamp yapacak. Bordo-mavili takımın başında 4 resmi müsabaka geçiren Teknik Direktör Rıza Çalımbay, yeni takımını markaj altına alacak. Eksikleri tespit edip sıkıntılara çözüm üretmeye çalışacak olan deneyimli teknik adam yönetim kuruluna da durumu rapor edecek. 
Sıkıntılı günleri geride bırakmak istiyor 
Trabzonspor, Rıza Çalımbay ile sıkıntılı günleri geride bırakmak istiyor. Teknik Direktör Ersun Yanal ile yaşadığı kaoslu günleri Rıza Çalımbay'ın gelişiyle birlikte biraz olsun geride bırakmayı hedefleyen bordo-mavililer yeni hocasıyla çıktığı 3 lig ve 1 Ziraat Türkiye Kupası maçında 2 galibiyet, 1'er mağlubiyet ve beraberlik elde etti. Süper Lig'e verilen milli arayı en iyi şekilde değerlendirmek isteyen Çalımbay, oyuncularını daha yakından tanıyarak kendi oyun felsefesini hangi oyuncularla nasıl yapabileceği konusunda fikir sahibi olacak. 
Küsenleri kazanacak 
Trabzonspor Teknik Direktörü Rıza Çalımbay'ın Antalya'da 12 Kasım Pazar gününe kadar sürmesi planlanan kampta en büyük amacının forma giyemedikleri için küsen oyuncuları kazanmak olduğu belirtildi. Milli Takıma giden oyunculardan yoksun bir hazırlık dönemi geçirecek olan bordo-mavililerde Rıza Çalımbay, bu durumu fırsata çevirerek oynamayan oyuncularla daha yakından ilgilenme imkanı bularak performanslarını ve isteklerini yakından görecek. 
Bire bir görüşecek 
Trabzonspor Teknik Direktörü Rıza Çalımbay, Antalya'da yapılacak hazırlıkların yanı sıra oyuncularla yakından görüşme fırsatı da bulacak. Lige verilen milli arada kamp programını oyuncularla daha yakın olmak için programlayan deneyimli teknik adam birebir yapacağı görüşmelerle de moral ve motivasyon anlamında takımı toparlamayı planlıyor. Oyuncuların sorunlarını ve isteklerini dinleyecek olan Çalımbay, kendi oyun felsefesi ve çalışma programları hakkında da oyuncularını bilgilendirecek. 
Ön teşhis koyacak 
Bordo-mavililerin Antalya'da yapacağı 5 günlük kampta Çalımbay, oyuncuların kapasitelerini arttırmayı planlıyor. Kendi oyun düşüncesini, yapacaklarını ve hedeflerini oyuncularına anlatacak olan Çalımbay, kampı en iyi şekilde değerlendirerek ön teşhis koymayı planlıyor. Ligin ilk yarısına kadar oynanacak olan 6 maçlık bölümde ise tam teşhisi koymayı arzulayan Çalımbay, devre arasında yapılacak olan transferler ve birlikte olmak istediği oyuncular hakkında düşüncelerini yönetimle paylaşarak yeni bir yol haritası izleyecek. posts.title: Palandöken nefes alacak, insanlar sağlıklı yaşayacak
posts.text: Palandöken nefes alacak, insanlar sağlıklı yaşayacak 07 Kasım 2017 Salı, 11:29 Palandöken nefes alacak, insanlar sağlıklı yaşayacak (Fotoğraflı) ERZURUM (İHA) - Bugüne kadar ilçeye kazandırdığı 80 park ile halkının nefes almasını sağlayan Palandöken Belediye Başkanı Orhan Bulutlar, ilçeye 5 büyük park daha kazandırdı. İlçenin farklı merkez mahallelerinde parkların yapımı hızla tamamlanırken, Yunus Emre Mahallesinde ise sona yaklaşıldı. Palandöken Belediye Başkanı Orhan Bulutlar," Palandökeni nefes alabilmesi için milletimizin sağlıklı yaşayabilmesi için yeşil alanlara ihtiyaç vardır" dedi. Palandöken'deki park yatırımlarının kendisi için çok önemli olduğunun altını her fırsatta çizen Başkan Bulutlar," Palandöken İlçemizde yaptığımız çalışmaları hızlı bir şekilde sürdürürken imar planlarında yeşil alanlara büyük önem veriyoruz ve imar planlarımıza koyduğumuz parklarımızı birer birer tamamlıyoruz. Palandöken ilçemizde yeni yapılaşan alanlarımıza mutlaka yeşil alanlara yer ayırıyoruz. Parkların ne kadar değerli bir yatırım olduğunu vatandaşlarımız belki bundan 10 yıl sonra daha iyi anlayacaklar. Çünkü sahip olduğumuz yeşil alan miktarı kadar nefes alacağız sağlıklı yaşayacağız. Hiçbir zaman biz günü kurtaran değil, çocuklarımızın geleceğini kurtaracak yatırımlara imza atıyoruz. Bugün her yere yeşil alan yapıyorsunuz diye şikayet edenlerin çocukları ve torunları, bizlere hak verecek, ne kadar doğru bir iş yaptığımızı daha iyi anlayacaklar. Çünkü bizim en değerli yatırımımız 8 yılda 80 park alanlardır" dedi. Şehitler parkını 2 ve 3. etabında son rötuşlar yapılıyor Yunus Emre Mahallesi Kayakyolu bölgesinde yapımı devam eden ve yaklaşık 23 bin metrekarelik bir alan üzerine kurulan Şehitler Parkını 2. ve 3. etabı bölgeye bambaşka hava kazandırdığını ifade eden Belediye Başkanı Bulutlar," Şehitler Parkının 1. etabı 10 bin metrekare 2. etabı 3 bin 500 ve 3. etap ise 5 bin 750 metrekare çalışmalarımız hemen hemen tamamlandı. Çok küçük rötuş işler kaldı. Yine üçküme evler olarak bilinen kayak yolunun üst kısmında Yunus Emre Mahallemizde Nergis Evler olarak bilinen bölgemizde 7 bin 550 metrekare alana sahip yeni bir park daha yaptık. Yine Adnan Menderes Mahallemizde Millet Camii mevkiinde bin 700 metrekare alana sahip parkımızı ve özel paylaşım yurtlar bölgesin de bin 750 metrekarelik bir parkı da milletimizin hizmetine sunduk. Palandöken ilçemize yaptığımız bu parklar Palandökenin oksijen depoları haline gelecek. Palandökende vatandaşlar, bu parkta bol bol nefes alacak ve yürüyüş yaparak sağlıklı bir hayatın kapısını aralayacak" diye konuştu. Palandöken ilçesinde 2018 yılı daha verimli olacak Palandöken'de daha fazla, daha büyük ve daha modern parklar yapmaya devam edeceklerini de vurgulayan Başkan Bulutlar," Palandöken Belediyesi olarak çocuklarımıza ve şehrimize en büyük yatırımımız ve mirasımızı yaptığımız bu parklar olacak. 2018 yılı içerisinde planlarımız doğrultusun da projelendirdiğimiz çalışmaları bir bir hayata geçireceğiz. Yıldızkent bölgemiz de yapımı hızlı bir şekilde devam eden ikinci Kültür Merkezimiz tamamlanarak hizmete girecek. Yine Yenişehir Bölgemizde yapımına başlanan Erzurum'umuzun ilk ve tek Nikah Sarayı 2018 yılı sonlarına doğru hizmete girmiş olacak. Park ve yeşil alan çalışmalarımız artarak devam edecek. Milletimizin sağlıklı bir şekilde kullanabilmesi için parkalarımızın temiz, güvenilir, sağlıklı olabilmesi için bizler ve ekiplerimiz 7/24 saat milletimizin emrinde çalışıyoruz ve çalışacağız. Milletimizde bu noktada yapılına bu alanları korusun ve kolasın" dedi. (ERZ-Y)

thread.title: Priti Patel Israel meetings criticised - but Theresa May has 'full confidence' in her
thread.title_full: Priti Patel Israel meetings criticised - but Theresa May has 'full confidence' in her

posts.author: James Rodger
posts.title: Priti Patel Israel meetings criticised - but Theresa May has 'full confidence' in her
posts.text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Theresa May still has full confidence in International Development Secretary Priti Patel despite having to give her a dressing down over a series of secret meetings in Israel, Downing Street said. 
The Prime Minister was forced to remind Ms Patel of her obligations as a minister after she took time out from a family holiday to meet Israeli prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu, other politicians, businesses and charities without telling the Foreign Office. 
Ms Patel only made Mrs May aware of the meetings on Friday - more than two months after they took place - when reports began to emerge of talks she held with a politician and a disability charity. 
The minister has apologised and admitted a "lack of precision" for suggesting last week that Foreign Secretary Boris Johnson knew about the trip, and that only two meetings had taken place when she attended 12. 
Labour called for a full investigation into whether Ms Patel broke the ministerial code and accused her of "misleading the British public". 
But she appears to have avoided the sack after going to Number 10 on Monday to apologise to Mrs May, who "reminded her of her obligations" under the ministerial code, the PM's official spokesman said. Priti Patel sashays into Downing Street to be told she is keeping her cabinet post (Image: PA) Read More Top stories from Britain and around the world - Angela Merkel wins forth term as Nationalists enter German Parliament 
"The important point here is that no UK interests were damaged or affected by the meetings which took place and the Secretary of State has apologised for the way she handled this matter," he told reporters. 
"The code is not explicit in this area and one of the things which will follow from this is that the PM has asked the Cabinet Secretary (Sir Jeremy Heywood) to look at how the code can be made clearer in this respect." 
The meetings in Israel between August 13 and 25 were arranged by the honorary president of the lobbying group Conservative Friends of Israel, Lord Polak, who also attended all but one. Priti Patel arrives in Downing Street, London, as Prime Minister Theresa May puts the finishing touches to her top team. PRESS ASSOCIATION Photo. Picture date: Thursday July 14, 2016. See PA story POLITICS Conservatives. Photo credit should read: Andrew Matthews/PA Wire Read More 2017 John Lewis Christmas advert: Is this the first glimpse? 
On returning from her trip, Ms Patel commissioned Department for International Development (Dfid) work on disability and humanitarian and development partnerships between Israel and the UK. 
It followed a meeting with director general of the Israeli foreign ministry Yuval Rotem in which the pair discussed "prospects for partnership work between Israel and the UK on development and humanitarian issues". 
It also followed a meeting with charities Beit Issie Shapiro and Wheelchairs of Hope, which are dedicated to disability and social inclusion. Employment minister Priti Patel launches a new government scheme to give extra careers advice to school pupils during a visit to Holy Trinity Catholic School in Birmingham. PRESS ASSOCIATION Photo. Picture date: Thursday January 14, 2016. Advisers from jobcentres will offer 12 to 18-year-olds an insight into the world of work and advice on options like traineeships and apprenticeships. See PA story INDUSTRY Careers. Photo credit should read: Joe Giddens/PA Wire Read More Transfer news: Everton eye Norwich's former Coventry City starlet 
Ms Patel and Mr Netanyahu, who held talks with Mrs May in London last week before she found out about the meeting, discussed "prospects for closer collaboration". 
Shadow Cabinet Office minister Jon Trickett said there had been a "clear breach" of the ministerial code while shadow international development secretary Kate Osamor called for an investigation. 
Ms Osamor said: "Today's statement is a desperate last-ditch attempt by Priti Patel to save her job. 
"It has now emerged that, contrary to her statement on Friday, the Foreign Secretary was never told in advance about her meetings in Israel - which we have only now discovered included meetings with Prime Minister Netanyahu and with the Foreign Ministry. 
"Not only does it look like she might have breached the ministerial code, she has now been caught misleading the British public. If she doesn't now resign, then Theresa May must immediately refer the issue to the Cabinet Office for a full investigation." 
Apologising for her conduct, Ms Patel said: "This summer I travelled to Israel, on a family holiday paid for myself. 
"While away, I had the opportunity to meet a number of people and organisations. I am publishing a list of who I met. The Foreign and Commonwealth Office was aware of my visit while it was under way. 
"In hindsight, I can see how my enthusiasm to engage in this way could be misread, and how meetings were set up and reported in a way which did not accord with the usual procedures. I am sorry for this and I apologise for it. 
"My first and only aim as the Secretary of State for International Development is to put the interests of British taxpayers and the world's poor at the front of our development work." 
Dfid said: "The FCO (Foreign Office) are clear that UK interests were not damaged or affected by the meetings on this visit." Like us on Facebook

posts.text:
教えてください。
Ｍ２０のボルトに３０Ｎ・ｍにて締付けた場合ボルトの軸にはどのくらいの力が（ｋｇｆ？N?）

thread.title_full: Ökonomen streiten über Verteilungsfrage - Forum - ARIVA.DE

posts.text: Mentalität (erkennen, verstehen, akzeptieren, entwickeln) > Spekulationssphäre (erkunden, auch taktil) > Instrumente (erkunden, auch haptisch) > Erzählungen, die dazu passen (selbst erfinden oder entwenden) = Performance. Der erste Schritt ist typischerweise der kausale Stolperstein. Denn es gilt: Wer seine Mentalität verkennt, nicht akzeptieren kann oder bekämpft, den holt sie immer wieder ein, meist durch die Hintertür. Besonders gefährdet sind Spekulationstypen, die glauben, ihre 'Emotionen kontrollieren' zu können, weil die am Markt angeblich nichts verloren hätten. Wer mehr wissen will, dem empfehle ich ein Abo.

posts.text:
Home View All Jobs ( 2,177,418 ) Caliber Home Loans Closer/Funder - Chandler, AZ - Chandler, AZ in Chandler , Arizona 
Caliber Home Loans, Inc. is a full-service national mortgage lender and agency direct seller/servicer. Caliber originates loans through various channels and transaction types, including a network of retail branches, wholesale lending, correspondent and emerging banker lending, and a consumer-direct centralized operation specializing in a variety of loan programs for purchase and refinance such as conforming, jumbo, and government products. Caliber also offers innovative servicing solutions for both conforming and non-conforming loans. Caliber is led by a veteran senior management team that consists of mortgage banking professionals with a history of building successful national mortgage operations. Caliber is owned by Lone Star Funds, a global private equity fund. 
POSITION SUMMARY The Closer/Funder is responsible for preparing loan packages for the closing and funding process. 
RESPONSIBILITIES * Reviews loan package for required documentation * Ensures loan package meets compliance guidelines and fixing discrepancies as necessary * Inputs and confirms data required to generate closing documents * Generates, reviews, and approves the Closing Package & HUD1 Settlement Statement * Serves as liaison between Caliber and closing agent * Calculates funding amount for each loan package, balances figures with closing agent, releases wire and funds loan * Completes work within established closing deadlines * This position is considered a non-loan originator position, this means participants may not engage in activities of a loan originator, including: communicating directly with borrowers about credit qualification or loan terms, including pricing concessions or other transaction-specific terms or conditions 
REQUIREMENTS (EDUCATION, SKILLS, & KNOWLEDGE) * High school diploma or equivalent required; 4-year college degree preferred * 1-2 years of mortgage-related experience * 1-2 years loan funding experience preferred * Basic knowledge of loan documentation * Advanced computer sills including Excel and Outlook * Advanced mathematical skills * Excellent interpersonal, written and oral communication skills * Familiar with reading and interpreting insurance policies, tax information, prelims, appraisals and settlement statements * Knowledge of MDIA and RESPA disclosure requirements * Strong attention to detail and organization skills * Ability to work in a fast-paced environment 
Caliber Home Loans, Inc. is focused on being the best mortgage company in the United States and winning through talent. Caliber is committed to diversity and is an Equal Employment Opportunity employer. Visit us at www.CaliberHomeLoans.com to learn more.

posts.author: JOBS&SCHOLARSHIPS (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Fully-Funded Year of Exchange Undergraduate Programme for Russian Students in USA, 2018
posts.text:
The Embassy of the United States of America is now accepting an application for its Fully-Funded Year of Exchange Undergraduate Programme. The YEAR Program is fully funded, covering tuition, housing, international travel, medical insurance, and other basic living expenses. The aim of the program is to provide outstanding Russian students, ages 18-20, a unique opportunity to study for one year at U.S. institutions of higher education.The programme also aims to strengthen each participant’s English skills and subject knowledge. The Embassy of the United States of America in Moscow is the diplomatic mission of the United States of America in the Russian Federation. The embassy complex is located in the Presnensky District in the city centre of Moscow. Scholarship Description: Applications close: November 10, 2017
Course Level:  Programme is available to pursue undergraduate degree.
Study Subject: Programme is awarded in the major fields of study, American studies, and a wide range of electives that offer the opportunity to explore new disciplines.
Scholarship Award: The YEAR Program is fully funded, covering tuition, housing, international travel, medical insurance, and other basic living expenses.
Number of Scholarships: Number of Programme is not given.
Scholarship can be taken in the USA Eligibility for the Scholarship: The following criteria must be met in order for applicants to be eligible for the scholarship: A citizen of the Russian Federation at the time of application and during the selection process. Born on July 20, 1997, and July 1, 2000. Graduated secondary school as of August 2018. Proficient in spoken and written English at the time of application. Able to demonstrate outstanding academic ability. Able to convincingly demonstrate existing and durable ties to Russia and a firm commitment to return to Russia after the completion of the program. Able to display the maturity required to succeed on a year-long international exchange program. Able to begin the program in the United States in July of 2018. Eligible to receive a U.S. J-1 Exchange Visitor non-immigrant category visa. Eligible Countries: Russian applicants are eligible to apply for the programme. College Admission Requirement: Entrance Requirements: Applicants must have previous year degree. English Language Requirements: Applicants must have excellent written and verbal English skills. Scholarship Award: The program is fully sponsored by the U.S. government and includes: International travel from home city to U.S. host college or university. Tuition at U.S. university/college and living expenses. Health insurance. Arrival orientation. On program support available 24 hours per day. USA Scholarship How to Apply: Applicants can apply via online: The application will be available until 11:59 PM (EST) on November 10, 2017. Please note that your application must be submitted by this date in order to be considered in the selection process. Online Application Scholarship Link

thread.section_title: Family News - The Scotsman
thread.title: Duncan Dunlop: Let’s talk about love in the care system – at the moment there isn’t any - The Scotsman
thread.title_full: Duncan Dunlop: Let’s talk about love in the care system – at the moment there isn’t any - The Scotsman

posts.author: scotsman.com
posts.title: Duncan Dunlop: Let’s talk about love in the care system – at the moment there isn’t any - The Scotsman
posts.text:
0 
Have your say It has been a year since we called on the First Minister to consider what was going wrong with the care system in ­Scotland. A year after she sat down with young people from Who Cares? Scotland. A year since she decided to call for a Root and Branch Review of the Care System (now known as the Independent Care Review). 
One year on, the First Minister has shown she will not wait for the review to conclude but will look to make improvements throughout its ­journey. 
Following moves from North ­Ayrshire Council, who had been ­calling for an exemption to council tax for young people who have been in care, the First Minister announced this as a Scotland-wide policy. It’s an excellent sign that we are not ­waiting until the end of the Independent Care Review to take action. 
Immediate action to fix current ­inequalities is a great leap forward. However, we hope that at the conclusion of the care review this inequality won’t exist.
Make no mistake, this was an immeasurably powerful commitment from the First Minister. The care system has been in existence for 150 years and there has been change.
However, it has always been change within the current construct. We still haven’t solved how to care for young people in Scotland whose own ­parents aren’t able to. The ­current Review of Care in ­Scotland has the capacity to make a radical change however. A radical change to how people are cared for in Scotland. 
Outcomes, at present, for care-experienced people are shockingly poor. The statistics show that 45 per cent of children in care are diagnosed as having a mental health disorder.
In residential units, research shows that 39 per cent of children have self-harmed. Part of the problem is in how we deliver care and in the language around care. Homes are referred to as units or placements. Those who are meant to love and support you are called staff. Language matters and it’s never neutral. It’s not just mental health that ­suffers. Care-experienced ­people are less likely to achieve high school ­qualifications, less likely to go to ­university and more ­likely to end up in prison.
With many ­children ­experiencing as many as ten ­placement moves in their care journey, it’s easy to see why they may struggle at school and why they ­struggle at home and in the ­communities they find themselves being moved into.
Our members tell us that they feel like they live in a system that takes care of everything as a means of ­managing risk. A system which doesn’t reflect the process of growing up in a traditional family home. A system without love. This can leave them exposed in a world where, when they turn 21, they find themselves having to deal with the harsh realities of life. In many cases, they leave a ­system which, in seeking to stop things ­happening to them, hasn’t been able to make enough things happen for them. 
It is important that we deliver ­radical change.The average age of leaving care is 16 to 18 according to the Centre for ­Excellence for Looked After Children in Scotland but the law says young people have the right to remain in care until they are 21. 
Every single month this year, one of our young members has died. Why, if young people have the right to stay in what they feel is a secure and ­stable environment, are they leaving five years before they have to? 
They are swapping five years of ­safety and stability for uncertainty. So, we hope that the review examines what has made this happen. It comes back to love and how we care for our young people. They are brought up in a world of risk assessments, of logs that record their every move and behaviour. An environment that is alien to what a family home should feel like. 
Young people want to be loved. They want the freedom to love people back. The status quo is presented as though the system is neutral towards the idea of love. It isn’t. It doesn’t talk about it at all, that’s not neutral. 
Let’s talk about how we bring young people up in an environment that is stable and secure but also, shows them that we love them. Let’s talk about love. 
Duncan Dunlop is CEO of Who Cares? Scotland.

thread.title: Bertemu Trump, Presiden Korsel Sebut AS Sahabat Sejati
thread.title_full: Bertemu Trump, Presiden Korsel Sebut AS Sahabat Sejati

posts.title: Bertemu Trump, Presiden Korsel Sebut AS Sahabat Sejati
posts.text: "Ada pepatah mengatakan seorang sahabat sejati adalah yang ada saat dibutuhkan," tutur Moon kepada Trump di Kamp Humphreys di Pyeongtaek, seperti dikutip AFP . "AS adalah sahabat sejati yang selalu bersama dan berjuang di tengah masa sulit," lanjut dia. Hubungan Moon dengan Trump sempat merenggang karena perbedaan pendapat mengenai cara mengatasi Korut. Moon tetap mendorong cara diplomatis untuk menangani Korut, sementara Trump sebaliknya. Dalam tulisan di Twitter saat tur Asia, Trump menyebut Moon sebagai "pria baik hati." Ia berjanji akan menyelesaikan perbedaan dengan Moon. "Kita lihat saja nanti," sebut Trump. Kekhawatiran Moon akan pecahnya perang beralasan, karena posisi negaranya yang sangat dekat dengan Korut. Dalam pidatonya di parlemen Korsel pekan lalu, ia berkata, "sebaiknya tidak ada aksi militer di semenanjung tanpa ada persetujuan terlebih dahulu dari pihak kita." Sementara Trump pernah mengancam akan mengirimkan "api dan kemarahan" kepada rezim Korut yang dipimpin Kim Jong-un. Perang kata-kata antara Trump dan Kim terus meningkat sejak beberapa pekan terakhir, yang semakin membuat khawatir masyarakat Korsel. "Kami menjaga kehidupan masyarakat kami seperti Amerika kepada warganya, dan kami merasa takut terhadap potensi terjadinya perang," tulis sebuah editorial di Korea Times. Sebelum ke Korsel, Trump telah bertemu Perdana Menteri Jepang Shinzo Abe untuk merapatkan barisan dalam menghadapi Korut. Dari Korsel, Trump akan bertolak ke Tiongkok dan Vietnam. (WIL)

posts.text:
"Goggle stünde Dir nun allerdings ebenso zur Verfügung<<
"naja" und "stünde" weist darauf hin, dass vor beleidigender unterstellung von lügen bzw hochstapelei, nicht gerne abstand genommen wird. dabei sollte es nicht schwer sein, zumindest einen einzigen zweifelsfreien nachweis als untermauerung der angedeuteten zweifel zu erbringen. zu viel arbeit, keine zeit? verstehe schon, ein bein anzupissen ist energieökonomisch betrachtet vorteilhafter.
ich denke intellektuelle sensibilität ist bei der intelligenz schon ein guter teil der basis.
"5 x mit der Streukanone geschossen und 4 1/2 x daneben"
ist das die form von inhalt und sachlichkeit, die hier eingefordert wird? wäre es vermessen, nach dem grund für diese herabwürdigende bewertung zu fragen und eine allfällige verifizierung einzufordern.
ich denke die koexistenz von vernunft und emotion bedarf permanenter kotrolle und disziplin.

Nasdaq Nordiq was established in 2003 for the primary purpose of overseeing the stock exchanges in Nordic countries. Aside from the Nasdaq Stockholm, it also operates the Tallinn Stock Exchange, commonly known as Nasdaq Baltic; the Riga Stock Exchange, commonly known as Nasdaq Baltic; the Iceland Stock Exchange, commonly known as Nasdaq Iceland; the Helsinki Stock Exchange, commonly known as Nasdaq Helsinki; the Copenhagen Stock Exchange, commonly known as Nasdaq Copenhagen; and the Armenia Stock Exchange, commonly known as Nasdaq OMX Armenia. 
The Nasdaq Stockholm has been present since 1863, making it one of the oldest European stock exchanges. It has only adopted electronic trading on June 1, 1990. Prior to this, floor trading had happened at the Stockholm Stock Exchange Building. 
The regular session on the Nasdaq Stockholm commences from 9:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. every business day. That is the time for Clas Ohlson AB to count its gain. 
The OMX Stockholm 30 Index (OMXS30) is the market-capitalization-weighted index that monitors the 30 most active stocks on the Nasdaq Stockholm. Numerous sectors make up the OMXS30; and the top three largest sectors are Industrials, Financials, and Consumer Services. Being the benchmark index in Sweden, it is a crucial indicator of the Swedish economy. 
The OMXS30 is rebalanced twice a year, ensuring a strong indication of how well the Swedish equity market is. thread.section_title: Higher education | Mumsnet Discussion
thread.title: 3 vs 4 A-levels and Uni offers
thread.title_full: 3 vs 4 A-levels and Uni offers | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: Needmoresleep
posts.text:
If they can manage more than three, I see no harm.
1. It enables them to keep up subjects that might be useful at University. DS was able to take both history and double maths along with economics. DD took five STEM subjects, giving her a head start in medicine. (She apparently aced some health statistics problems last week - others will get there but it is nice to be familiar with some of the early content.) Breadth may also help them when it comes to applying for Masters/Intercalation.
2. It prepares you for the volume of work at University. DD had no frees at all at school, despite a longer than average school week. She now has something like 30 contact hours.
3. Taking more than three offers protection from dropping an odd grade, so make the summer of Yr13 busy but more relaxed.
DC would have dropped one like a shot had they started to struggle. They seem to have mastered both time management and the art of "good enough", both key life skills. They and their peers seemed to have plenty of time for other things. If asked how to manage, I think both would say that you need to listen in class. That is where the learning takes place. There has been some surprise later to see others happily skipping lectures.
Early advice for DS was to take double maths if he planned to take a degree with a high maths content, as it is easier to learn at school than at University. Often subjects are not "required", but they are expected to catch up quickly at a point when so much is new.
As for medics, Birmingham now give a different offer for those with four A levels. Cambridge, perhaps Imperial, sometimes give offers on four. QMUL used to give more points to those with four, but seems to have dropped this. Other than that I doubt that many look for more than three, as they will want to ensure all suitable applicants have an equal chance. But generally a broader education is a good thing, so if you can, why not?

posts.author: 国是直通车
posts.title: 亚太国家领导人齐聚越南，所为何事？_凤凰资讯
posts.text:
原标题：亚太国家领导人齐聚越南，所为何事？
11月10日，亚太经合组织（APEC）第二十五次领导人非正式会议将在越南度假胜地举行。对这次会议，大家最关心的问题无疑是：要谈什么？能谈出什么？中国会怎么谈？
中国APEC发展理事会理事长张力军近日接受中新社“国是直通车”专访，“剧透”APEC越南会议。
今年APEC会议对亚太区域经济复苏有怎样的意义？
当前，世界经济的总体趋势向好，但国际金融危机的深层次影响仍未消除，一系列不确定因素依然存在。主要发达经济体在金融危机中普遍暴露出自身存在的结构性问题，尚未找到有效的根治方案。受全球经济环境的影响，新兴经济体的经济增速也有所放缓。
与此同时，在政治、经济、社会和文化等多种复杂因素驱动下，世界一些国家和地区出现了“逆全球化”的论调和基于保守主义的对外经济政策，贸易保护主义在全球范围内有所抬头。上述因素给世界经济全面复苏带来了巨大挑战。
在这种情况下，国际社会期盼APEC各成员能够在今年的会议上进一步凝聚共识，加强宏观经济政策协调，为亚太区域经济一体化进程注入新的活力，使亚太地区在促进世界经济复苏和健康增长方面发挥更加突出的引擎作用。
今年APEC会议以“打造全新动力，开创共享未来”为主题，在议题上以继续深入推进亚太区域经济一体化进程、加强中小企业的创新能力和竞争力、促进粮食安全为重点，旨在实现亚太地区地区的可持续、创新和包容性增长。
APEC对中国的作用和角色有何期待？
自中国1991年加入APEC以来，该组织为中国积极融入经济区域化和区域经济一体化进程提供了重要的平台，有效促进了中国与亚太地区众多经济体之间的经贸关系，为中国构建多元化的国际经济合作体系奠定了坚实的基础。同时，APEC也成为了中国开展首脑外交、周边外交和经济外交的重要场所。另一方面，中国作为APEC中最大的发展中成员，也为推动APEC形成独特运行方式和各领域合作做出了贡献。
此外，2014年中国第二次作为东道主成功举办了APEC会议，会议形成了《APEC推动实现亚太自由贸易区路线图》、《APEC促进全球价值链发展合作战略蓝图》、《APEC互联互通蓝图2015-2025》等一系列具有开创意义的成果和合作计划。上述合作计划目前仍处在落实和实施的关键阶段。因此，中国在今年的APEC会议上将和其他成员加强协调与合作，努力推动上述领域的合作取得阶段性的务实成果。
在当前“逆全球化”暗流涌动的状况下，亚太自贸区进展如何？
在深化亚太区域经济一体化方面，亚太自由贸易区（FTAAP）的建设始终受到高度关注。作为实施2014年北京会议制定的《亚太自由贸易区北京路线图》的重要步骤，APEC在2016年完成了亚太自由贸易区的联合战略研究。在此基础上，各成员期待领导人们在2017年的APEC会议上为继续推进实现亚太自由贸易区做出新的指示。此外，APEC各成员在今年的会议上还讨论了如何更好地开展部门性的合作，以及相关的能力建设活动，为实现亚太自由贸易区创造更加完备的基础条件。
根据APEC领导人已取得的共识，跨太平洋伙伴关系协定（TPP）和区域全面经济伙伴关系协定（RCEP）都是通向亚太自由贸易区的有效路径。但是，美国在今年初决定退出TPP。虽然日本等其余TPP成员仍在为“TPP-1”能够生效做出努力，但成功与否仍不确定。
此外，RCEP谈判也尚未取得重大突破。因此，在TPP和RCEP的前景都不太明朗的情况下，一些APEC成员对推动亚太自由贸易区并不积极，今年取得实质性进展的难度较大。
今年APEC会议在“结构改革和创新”方面将有哪些突出成果？
APEC结构改革重点关注有助于提高市场和交易效率的“边界内”措施，有关制度框架、管理规章和政府政策方面的改进和提高均可视之为结构改革措施。创新合作的主要内容是促进技术转让、推广和商业化，强化知识产权的利用、商业化和有效保护，并加强创新能力建设，改善创新环境。
在结构改革和创新方面，今年APEC会议的预期成果将包括以下几个方面：
继续推进实施《APEC结构改革议程》（RAASR），敦促APEC各成员提交实施该议程的单边行动计划，并加强经验交流和能力建设合作；
加强竞争政策合作，具体目标包括完善各成员负责竞争政策事务的机构设置、促进国有企业和私营企业的平等竞争等；
鼓励各种形式的创新活动，包括技术革新，以及产品设计、生产、加工、市场营销等环节的创新；
推进《APEC营商便利化计划2016-2018》的实施，进一步改善亚太地区的经验环境；
挖掘服务业对于促进实现亚太可持续和包容增长目标的作用，进一步推进实施2015年制定的《APEC服务业合作框架》和2016年制定的《APEC服务业竞争力路线图》；
加强人力资源开发，加强跨境教育合作和技能培训、促进资格相互认证，以及为学者、科研人员和学生的跨境旅行提供便利等。
今年APEC上有哪些涉及中小企业的利好消息？
APEC地区超过97%的企业属于中小微企业，是市场经营活动的主体。但是，与大型企业相比，中小微企业往往在市场竞争中处于劣势。尤其是在当前的数字时代，由于很多中小微企业难以负担使用现代网络信息技术的成本或缺乏能够运用信息技术的雇员，使得它们在融入全球价值链和开展跨国经营方面面临着越来越多的困难。
基于上述现实问题，今年APEC会议讨论的重点包括为中小企业更好地参与全球价值链合作提供便利、在数字化时代为中小企业营造更好的经营环境，以及鼓励绿色、初创型和创新型中小企业的发展等，并围绕上述领域形成具体的成果文件。
在“开创共享未来”的主题倡议，APEC在应对粮食安全问题方面有何成果？
今年APEC会议在粮食安全领域的预期成果将主要集中在以下几个方面：
其一，粮食安全与气候变化。气候变化所带来的影响给粮食安全造成了威胁，也给很多APEC成员带来了挑战。因此，APEC将推进制定粮食安全与气候变化的多年期行动计划，倡导各成员开展集体和单边行动，并重点在农业科技开发和应用方面开展合作和经验分享。
其二，可持续的自然资源管理。亚太地区的自然资源正面临着各种威胁，如土壤流失、淡水减少、生物多样性受破坏，以及海洋和渔业资源减少等。为此，APEC将鼓励各成员重点在水资源、森林资源和海洋资源领域开展跨境合作，并借此促进粮食安全和环境保护。
其三，农业部门的贸易投资便利化。亚太地区的粮食生产量和贸易量均占世界首位，因此，促进农业部门的贸易投资便利化对于实现粮食安全的目标至关重要。APEC各成员将致力于开展政策协调和项目合作，促进农业部门和食品加工部门的供应链连接，完善物流基础设施和零售服务网络。

thread.title_full: 쌍용차, 2018년을 준비하는 ‘오피스 딜리버리’ 실시

posts.author: 조문곤기자
posts.title: 쌍용차, 2018년을 준비하는 ‘오피스 딜리버리’ 실시
posts.text: ※ 각 회사로부터 받은 보도자료를 (사진이나 도표 없이) 본문만 그대로 업로드합니다. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 쌍용차, 2018년을 준비하는 ‘오피스 딜리버리’ 실시 -새해를 맞이하는 직장인들을 위한 사무용품 배달 응원, ‘12월의 산타 프로젝트’ -월말까지 신청 접수 통해 총 200팀 추첨, 판매상담 통해 계약하면 1% 특별할인 혜택 -계절에 따라 직장인 대상 다양한 딜리버리 이벤트 통해 ‘깜짝’ 즐거움 선사 쌍용자동차(대표이사 최종식; www.smotor.com)가 신년계획에 꼭 필요한 사무용품과 함께 직장인들을 응원 방문하는 ‘오피스 딜리버리’를 실시한다고 7일 밝혔다. 쌍용차는 연말에도 열심히 근무하고 있는 직장인들을 위한 ‘12월의 산타 프로젝트’, ‘오피스 딜리버리(Office Delivery)’를 진행한다. 참가를 원하는 사람은 쌍용자동차 홈페이지를 방문해 근무지 주소 등 간략한 정보와 신청사연 등을 작성하면 된다. 신청기간은 오는 30일(목)까지로 신청자 중 추첨을 통해 총 200팀을 선정하며, 추첨 결과를 오는 12월 5일(화) 발표한다. 당첨된 팀을 대상으로 쌍용차 오토매니저가 2018년 탁상달력을 비롯해 사무실에 꼭 필요한 용품을 들고 응원 방문한다. 원할 경우 오토매니저와 차량구매 상담도 진행할 수 있으며, 구매 계약을 체결하면 차종에 관계 없이 판매가의 1% 특별할인 혜택(올 연말까지 출고 시)이 주어진다. 쌍용차는 지난 해 여름 시원한 간식과 함께 직장인들을 응원 방문하는 ‘삼바 딜리버리’를 처음 실시한 뒤 ‘가을애(愛) 딜리버리’, ‘쿨 서머 딜리버리’ 등 계절별로 다양한 선물과 함께 직장을 방문하는 고객감사 딜리버리 이벤트를 시행하면서 큰 호응을 얻어 왔다.

posts.title: (USA-DC-Washington) Client Solutions Coordinator
posts.text:
Home View All Jobs ( 2,176,746 ) The Washington Post Client Solutions Coordinator in Washington , District Of Columbia 
Are you ready to join a global media powerhouse that is reshaping what it means to be a content publisher? Are you interested in joining a team that is central to The Washington Post’s client solutions mission to cultivating innovative partnerships with national brands? Do you possess savvy organizational skills and a fearlessness to get the job done? 
The Washington Post is looking for a hard-working Client Solutions Coordinator to join our advertising team. The CSC will play a key role in keeping our high-profile clients satisfied with expert customer service and in identifying new advertising prospects. The CSC position will work side by side with the Washington Post’s Vice President of Client Solutions, account executives and internal service teams to strengthen and enhance our reputation as a powerful resource for all client solutions. 
Responsibilities include: Identify, research and cold call potential clients and create a robust pipeline of vetted prospects for the client solutions team Organize, prioritize and pursue prospective clients using clearly defined processes Record, distribute and monitor incoming inquiries for the entire team Effectively communicate The Washington Post’s value proposition to potential clients Create, maintain and distribute leadership team sales pipeline reports Coordinate with the global marketing team to prepare for premier client meetings Manage all activities with internal Service teams including new accounts, financial credit applications, make-up, creating insertion orders, matching work orders, and providing client campaign proofs ensuring smooth and successful execution Assess internal team operations and recommend opportunities for process improvement Assist in orienting new team members Maintain Vice President of Client Solutions’ appointment schedule by planning and scheduling meetings, calls and travel 
Requirements include: Strong skills in communication, customer service, organization and analysis Fearlessness in calling clients Ability to work well with others and to multitask in a deadline-driven environment Ability to define problems, collect data, draw conclusions and present findings to internal and external clients 
Ability to assume accountability for completing assignments accurately and in a timely manner

thread.section_title: Higher education | Mumsnet Discussion
thread.title: 3 vs 4 A-levels and Uni offers
thread.title_full: 3 vs 4 A-levels and Uni offers | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: titchy
posts.text:
It isn't true that most medics offer four - most offer three.
While as I've said many will have four, only having three will not make any difference to the likelihood of getting an offer.
Do not EVER encourage your kid to take four thinking it'll make it a little easier to get an offer unless you can absolutely guarantee grades will not be affected.
Whilst it's true that a few do adjust the offer if the applicant has four, most offer based on three and medicine is so competitive you'd be a fool not to want to maximise your chances of as many offers as possible.

thread.section_title: La Provincia - Canarias
thread.title: Brito reprocha a Podemos su silencio tras la sentencia que obliga a readmitirle
thread.title_full: Brito reprocha a Podemos su silencio tras la sentencia que obliga a readmitirle

posts.author: La Provincia
posts.title: Brito reprocha a Podemos su silencio tras la sentencia que obliga a readmitirle
posts.text:
í 
Juan Manuel Brito exigió ayer un pronunciamiento público a los cargos de Podemos que tomaron parte en el proceso por el que se le intentó expulsar del partido al inicio de este año. El exconsejero del Cabildo de Gran Canaria lamentó que nadie de un partido político "que se dice defensor de los derechos humanos" y "se llena la boca con alusiones al comité de ética" dé la cara ante la sentencia del Juzgado de Instrucción núón. 
En realidad, el dimitido integrante de la corporación insular estaba dentro de la formación morada desde abril, mes en que el juez Juan Luis Egea estimó de manera positiva las medidas cautelares solicitadas por la abogada de Brito, Dara Lorenzo, que dejaban sin efecto la expulsión. Tras conocer el pronunciamiento del magistrado, el exvicepresidente del Cabildo recalcó que la cuestión ventilada se aleja diametralmente del plano "formal" para ser una "vulneración de derechos fundamentales" recogidos en la Constitución como el de asociación y el de participación política. Por ello, entiende que el silencio imperante "" al propio partido. 
A pesar de ello, no eludió la enumeración de protagonistas que, en su opinión, más tuvieron que ver con el proceso de su salida del partido: Meri Pita , secretaria general de la formación morada en las Islas cuando se le abrió expediente y hoy diputada nacional; Noemí Santana, integrante del órgano interno "que inició la trama" y ahora máxima responsable del partido en el Archipiélago, y Gloria Elizo, integrante del Comité de Garantías Democráticas que decidióón y en estos momentos vicepresidenta cuarta del Congreso de los Diputados. 
Desde el partido que dirige Pablo Iglesias , mostraron ayer el "máximo respeto" por la decisión del juez -recurrible- y explicaron que el órgano disciplinario "actúa de forma independiente". Nadie parece interesado en entrar en un cuerpo a cuerpo que, entienden, solo serviría para alargar la presencia de la poléón. 
Juan Manuel Brito explicó este lunes que en realidad la "persecución y acoso" contra su persona tenía como fin la ruptura del pacto de estabilidad del que Podemos formaba parte en la institución insular. "De hecho yo dimití en febrero y solo un mes después se rompió el acuerdo", señaló. Además, se mostró seguro de que, a pesar del fallo judicial que le da la razón, obró con acierto al abandonar el Cabildo, ya que lo contrario habríún mayor para el Gobierno insular. 
Eso en cuanto a la repercusión política, que podría haber sido otra pero nada habra cambiado, porque fue el desgaste personal que le ocasionó "la campaña de acoso" contra su persona y el impacto padecido por su familia los que le convencieron de que era la senda que debía tomar. "No puedo entender la política por encima de las relaciones humanas"

thread.title: Creatieve 'oplossing' Tesla
thread.title_full: Creatieve 'oplossing' Tesla

posts.author: AutoWeek.nl
posts.title: Creatieve 'oplossing' Tesla
posts.text:
Creatieve 'oplossing' Tesla Beste bezoeker, 
Wij zien dat u een adblocker gebruikt waardoor u alleen advertenties ziet die door uw adblocker worden goedgekeurd. Dit vinden wij jammer, want autoweek.nl is mede dankzij deze advertenties gratis toegankelijk. Wilt u een uitzondering maken voor autoweek.nl, of meer lezen over hoe wij met advertenties omgaan? Klik dan hier . Slideshow Verkooppunten monteren zelf stoelen en display Mitchel van Essen Facebook Om de welbekende productiehel van de Tesla Model 3 uit het slop te trekken, komt het merk met een oplossing voor een snellere levering van het model. Om wat schot in de zaak te brengen, biedt Tesla zijn verkooppunten nu onafgemaakte voertuigen plus onderdelen aan. 
De onderdelen waar het om gaat, zijn onder andere de stoelen en de displays die in het goedkoopste model van Tesla moeten komen. Dat meldt de Amerikaanse krant Financial Times. Verkooppunten kunnen de onderdelen zelf plaatsen, want in de fabriek waar alle Model 3 's worden gebouwd, gebeurt dat ook met de hand. Hoe het proces verder in praktijk verloopt, is nog niet duidelijk. 
Keiharde rode cijfers achtervolgen Tesla al een tijdje. In plaats van 1.500 voertuigen werden er in het afgelopen kwartaal slechts 260 exemplaren afgeleverd. Tesla wees eerder op "knelpunten in de productie" als veroorzaker van de niet behaalde doelstelling . Zo zou de productie van de batterijmodules problemen hebben opgeleverd. Links

thread.title: Pon solgte 240-tonns hjullaster til Titania
thread.title_full: Pon solgte 240-tonns hjullaster til Titania

posts.author: ab@bygg.no (Byggeindustrien)
posts.title: Pon solgte 240-tonns hjullaster til Titania
posts.text:
Henla maskintyveri selv om GPS-sporing avslørte hvor tyvegodset var - Nå har politiet gjort beslag i Tyskland 06.11.2017 10:09 Sist oppdatert: 07.11.17, 10:39 Mennesker blir små ved siden av Cats hjullasterbeist 994K. Fra venstre Stig Vikeså, servicesjef i region Vest, Kjell Gunnar Stormo, Gunnar Vinterstø, og Oddvar Støle fra Titania, og ytterst til høyre, Anders Eriksson, salgssjef i Pon Mining Pon solgte 240-tonns hjullaster til Titania 
Titania har kjøpt det som er Norges største hjullaster.  42. Sist endret: 07.11.2017 10:43. 
Salg av Cat 994K hjullaster er ikke hverdagskost for Pon Equipment AS. 994K er en 240-tonns maskin som kan laste over 20 kubikk i skuffen og en payload på snaue 41 tonn. Maskinen er drøye 18 meter lang og over sju meter høy, og den har et motorvolum på 78 liter og hydraulikkpumper som gir drøye 2000 liter olje pr. minutt. Dette hjullasterbeistet har Pon solgt til Titania AS som holder til i Hauge i Dalana ved Jøssingfjorden i Rogaland fylke, skriver Pon Equipment i en pressemelding. 
Det er ikke første gang Pon selger store Cat maskiner til Titania, men det er første gang den norske Cat-leverandøren selger Cat 994K hjullaster i Norge. Hjullasteren skal laste ilmenitt på Cat 789 tipptrucker i dagbruddet. 
Handelen er gjort med Pon Mining som er Pons gruvedivisjon i Skandinavia. Gruvedivisjonen har hovedaktiviteten i Sverige. All service skjer via Pon Equipments serviceapparat i Rogaland. 
– Vi er veldig fornøyde med å få inn en slik hjullaster også i Norge. I Sverige har vi solgt en del 994 og kundene er svært fornøyd med disse sværingene, , sier Anders Eriksson i Pon Mining. 
Servicesjef i Vest Stig Vikeså, har tidligere stått for montering og service av Titanias maskiner som Cat 988 hjullaster, Cat 789 tipptrucker, samt Cat 6040 forgraver på hele 400 tonn. Han er hellig overbevist om at det også skal fungere greit å levere samt gi service til Norges største hjullaster, skriver Pon.

thread.title: Nær 400 deltar på HMS-konferansen
thread.title_full: Nær 400 deltar på HMS-konferansen

posts.author: ab@bygg.no (Arve Brekkhus)
posts.title: Nær 400 deltar på HMS-konferansen
posts.text:
Ditt tips Send inn 
Tirsdag og onsdag går den årlige HMS-konferansen i regi av EBA av stabelen på Thon Hotel Arena i Lillestrøm.  38. 
Det er stor deltakelse på arrangementet. Rundt 400 personer deltar på den niende HMS-konferansen i rekken. 
På konferansen har arrangøren samlet de viktigste aktørene i kjeden, både myndigheter, arbeidstakere og arbeidsgivere. Årets tema er samarbeid for sikkerhet, arbeidslivskriminalitet og HMS, ledelse og kultur og praktisk HMS. 
Nytt tema på konferansen i år er digitalisering og HMS. 
- Her får praktiske vi eksempler fra både bygg og anlegg. Vi får også høre om BNLs kulturprosjekt og nye tiltak for å bedre sikkerhetstilstanden i næringen, nemlig en merkeordning for arbeidsbukker og gardintrapper - Bra Arbeidsmiljøvalg, sier leder for HMS og Entreprenørskolen i EBA, Lene Jønsson. 
Samarbeid for sikkerhet er et viktig tema og topplederne Ståle Rød i Skanska, Jørgen Evensen i BetonmastHære og Arne Giske i Veidekke vil snakke om "Null dødsulykker! Sammen, eller hver for oss?" 
- Konferansen skal i tillegg til å være en arena for læring, også være en møteplass, sier Jønsson. 
På talerstolen står for øvrig blant annet statssekretær Morten Bakke i Arbeids- og sosialdepartementet, seniorrådgiver Bodil Mostue Aamnes, seniorrådgiver, avd. dokumentasjon og analyse og Stig Winge i Direktoratet for Arbeidstilsyn, prosjektsjef Stein Johnny Johansen i Statens vegvesen Region nord og adm. dir. Ingrid Dahl Hovland i Nye Veier AS for å nevne noen. Nøkkelord:
